relevant_communication: Through its AKKA Research department, AKKA Technologies is an active participant in relevant EU projects and workshops.
goals__remit: AKKA Technologies is an engineering and technology consulting company with 21 centers of excellence across Europe, Africa, Middle-East, Asia and the Americas. As a European leader in the mobility segment with more than 16,500 skilled employees and an in-house research center, AKKA Research, it supports its clients with a wide-range of global services for industrial projects and the ability to collaborate across the entire product lifecycle.
